node.title: Four children die, several critically injured after jumping castle blown into air at school
node.alt: Blue tarpaulin shield at Hillcrest Primary
node.description: Children fell from as high as 10 metres after wind pickedÂ up a jumping castle and threw it into the air at an end-of-year activity day at a Tasmanian primary school.
node.content:
["Four\u00a0children have\u00a0died\u00a0and four others are in a critical condition after wind picked up a jumping castle and threw it into the air at an end-of-year activity day at a Tasmanian primary school.", "Several grade 6\u00a0students fell\u00a0from a height of about 10 metres, causing serious injuries, when wind\u00a0blew the jumping castle into the air at Hillcrest Primary School in Devonport, in the state's north-west.", "Five children are in hospital, four of them critically injured.", "\"These children were meant to be celebrating their last day of primary school, instead we're all mourning their loss,\" Tasmania Police Commissioner Darren Hine said this afternoon.", "\"Emergency services were called to the scene around 10am this morning after a wind gust had reportedly caused the jumping castle and inflatable zorb balls to lift into the air,\" Commissioner Hine said.", "\"Of the four [deceased]\u00a0children, two were boys and two were girls.", "\"Our thoughts are also with those emergency services personnel who attended to try and save these people's lives.\"", "", "
Police officers comfort each other at the scene of the fatal accident.(ABC News)
", "Earlier, police said \"a\u00a0wind event caused a jumping castle to lift into the air.\"", "\"Several children fell from a height of about 10 metres around 10am and are currently receiving medical treatment at the scene as well as in hospitals.", "Speaking at the school earlier this afternoon, Commander Debbie Williams described the scene as \"distressing\".", "\"This is a very tragic event and our thoughts are with the families and the wider school community, and also our first responders,\" Commander Williams said.", "\"There is no doubt that this has been a very confronting and distressing scene.", "\"Counselling is being made available to the families affected by this in the school community along with the first responders.\"", "", "
Commander Debbie Williams says families and first responders are receiving counselling.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "As\u00a0well as multiple ambulances sent to the school, several helicopters also went to the scene to take\u00a0the injured to various hospitals.", "Witnesses said it was a very confronting scene with police and parents rushing towards the school.", "Police have been seen crying and embracing at the scene and many parents arrived at the school not knowing if their child had been affected.", "", "
The school has closed for the rest of the day.(ABC News)
", "Blue tarps were erected\u00a0near the tree where the jumping castle came to a rest, close to the school oval.", "People are being asked\u00a0to avoid the area.", "The school was running an end-of-year \"Big Day In\" celebration instead of a usual school picnic.", "", "
Emergency workers at the scene were visibly upset.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "", "
Several helicopters ferried injured children to hospital.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "
Neighbour recounts 'traumatic' moment
", "Bob Smith, who lives nearby, said he saw the jumping castle \"go up\" as he was heading inside, and returned \"two or three\" minutes later to discover the tragic scene.", "", "
Bob Smith described the scene as \"traumatic\".(ABC News: April McLennan)
", "\"Next minute we heard police and the ambulance and so on, it was pretty bad.", "\"My wife heard a bang.\u00a0It was pretty traumatic.\"", "Mr Smith said the community surrounding the primary school is \"close knit.\"", "\"[We're]\u00a0a bit shaken.\u00a0You don't expect anything like that,\" he said.", "\"The poor parents, I don't know what they're going to do.\"", "
'Unthinkably heartbreaking'
", "Tasmania's Premier Peter Gutwein was at a COVID-19 press conference in Hobart just after the incident.", "\"My thoughts are obviously with the people involved but obviously the parents of the children that have been injured and with the emergency services,\" Mr Gutwein said.", "\"As we receive further information on what I understand is a very serious matter we'll provide that as the day progresses.\"", "", "
Debris came to rest in a tree next to the school oval.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "Prime Minister Scott Morrison described\u00a0the incident as \"unthinkably heartbreaking\".", "\"Events that have occurred today in Devonport in Tasmania are just shattering,\" he said.", "Mr Morrison said he had\u00a0also spoken to Mr Gutwein about the tragedy.", "The Prime Minster was scheduled to travel to Tasmania on Friday, but has postponed his visit in light of the tragedy \"out of respect to the children, parents, teachers and broader community who are today mourning the loss of young lives\".", "\"The Prime Minister's thoughts and prayers remain with all those affected by this deeply tragic circumstance,\" a spokesperson for Mr Morrison said.\u00a0"]
